nodes.text: An ale, also referred to as beer, was any type of alcoholic beverage brewed from grains. There were a number of different types of ale including Trandoshan ale. During the rebellion against the Galactic Empire, Mon Mothma drank ale with Chief of Rebel Intelligence Airen Cracken while discussing the scope of the Tarkin Initiative. Following the Battle of Endor, the cantina Alcazar on the planet Akiva servered at least four types of ale along with grog and Starfire 'skee according to the bartender.
